comment: (it slipped me by) Faith Goldy and Laura Loomer team up in Toronto. This video is pure gold (no pun intended) as they try and attend a Public Welcome Jihadi event. Tags for, saucy notables and Breaking Newslease click the star next to the Marianne's Corner Topic (bc you need a Pro account to do this to my name instead) as I'm moving away from adding additional names to this list as it's getting quite lengthy. If you would like your name removed please let me know. Thank you all so much. -BELLA
